trustfund:
TF036643-CHINA - FOURTH NATIONAL AND
            SECOND FUJIAN PROVINCIAL HGIHWAYS,TF037982-CHINA - SECOND FUJIAN HIGHWAY PROJECT,TF025103-PHRD-SECOND FUJIAN HIGHWAY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
This report includes environmental
            impact assessments and action plans for the Second Fujian
            Highway Project, which constructs the Zhangzhou-Zhao'an
            Expressway and an interconnecting road and bridge program to
            relieve traffic congestion and improve the mobility and
            integration of inter-provincial trade, commerce, and tourism
            between Fujian and Guangdong provinces. Negative
            environmental impact mitigation include: Road surfaces,
            excavation areas, and construction sites will be sprayed
            with water and kept moist. Trucks will be distanced from
            residential sites or other sensitive spots. Ventilation fans
            will reduce air pollution. Asphalt mixing equipment will
            have dust collectors and be distanced from residential
            areas. Vegetation restoration including greenbelts on
            roadsides will rehabilitate the land. Afforestation, a
            soundproofing screen, and a restricted schedule for
            operating construction equipment and vehicles will reduce
            noise levels. Dumping levels will not exceed the surrounding
            ground level, intercepting ditches will be installed, blind
            pipes will discharge seepage, and borrow and spoil sites
            will be reconstructed or leveled after construction. To
            prevent water pollution, oil collection tanks, oil-water
            separators, garbage collecting stations, drainage gates, and
            controlled sand digging will be used, along with treatment
            of wastewater and sewage. Hazardous materials will be
            strictly monitored. Displaced persons will be resettled and compensated.
